methods.fillChunk:
Lookup each element in a RowSequence and write the result to a WritableLongChunk.

:param fillContext: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.ChunkSource.FillContext) - The FillContext
:param innerRowKeys: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.WritableLongChunk<? extendsio.deephaven.engine.chunk.Attributes.RowKeys>) - The result chunk
:param outerRowKeys: (io.deephaven.engine.structures.RowSequence) - The row keys to lookup in this RowRedirection
methods.fillChunkUnordered:
Lookup each element in a LongChunk and write the result to a WritableLongChunk.

:param fillContext: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.ChunkSource.FillContext) - The FillContext
:param innerRowKeys: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.WritableLongChunk<? extendsio.deephaven.engine.chunk.Attributes.RowKeys>) - The result chunk
:param outerRowKeys: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.LongChunk<io.deephaven.engine.chunk.Attributes.RowKeys>) - The row keys to lookup in this RowRedirection
methods.fillPrevChunk:
Lookup each element in a RowSequence and write the result to a WritableLongChunk, using previous
 values.

:param fillContext: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.ChunkSource.FillContext) - The FillContext
:param innerRowKeys: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.WritableLongChunk<? extendsio.deephaven.engine.chunk.Attributes.RowKeys>) - The result chunk
:param outerRowKeys: (io.deephaven.engine.structures.RowSequence) - The row keys to lookup in this RowRedirection
methods.get:
Simple redirected lookup.

:param outerRowKey: (long) - The "outer" row key
:return: (long) The corresponding "inner" row key, or RowSet.NULL_ROW_KEY if no mapping exists
methods.getPrev:
Simple redirected lookup, using previous values.

:param outerRowKey: (long) - The "outer" row key
:return: (long) The corresponding "inner" row key, or RowSet.NULL_ROW_KEY if no mapping exists
methods.isMutable: :return: (boolean) Whether this RowRedirection is actually mutable
methods.makeFillContext:
Make a FillContext for this RowRedirection. The default implementation supplied DEFAULT_FILL_INSTANCE,
 suitable for use with the default implementation of
 fillChunk(ChunkSource.FillContext, WritableLongChunk, RowSequence),
 fillChunkUnordered(ChunkSource.FillContext, WritableLongChunk, LongChunk), and
 fillPrevChunk(ChunkSource.FillContext, WritableLongChunk, RowSequence).

:param chunkCapacity: (int) - The maximum number of mappings that will be retrieved in one operation
:param sharedContext: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.SharedContext) - A SharedContext for use when the same RowRedirection will be used with the same
        keysToMap by multiple consumers
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.ChunkSource.FillContext) The FillContext to use
methods.mutableCast:
Cast this RowRedirection reference to a MutableRowRedirection.

:return: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.utils.MutableRowRedirection) this cast to a MutableRowRedirection

text:
Data structure for mapping one "outer" row key space to another "inner" row key space. Query engine components use
 this when a RowSet must be flattened or re-ordered.
